strategy: Use CatBoost with the following settings: iterations=500, learning_rate=0.03, depth=6. For preprocessing, fill numeric NaN values with the median. Do not use get_dummies for categorical columns; instead, pass the cat_features parameter to CatBoost. If you encounter dtype errors, cast categorical columns to strings before fitting the model.
